Texts.Chs: 太阳能发电板可以生成电力，而这正是其他用电设备所需要的。接下来，请制作一个^orange;电池组^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Solar panels generate power, and most other stations built here require that power to operate. Next, build the ^orange;Battery Unit^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 恭喜，你制造出了^orange;能源建造机^reset;！你^green;终于^reset;可以做出更高级的东西了。快做一个^orange;太阳能发电板(小型)^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: You've build a ^orange;Power Station^reset;! Now you can ^green;truly^reset; start doing some advanced stuff. Start by building a ^orange;solar panel^reset;.
